overview: In Gansu, north of China, two families talk about their ways of living in the farm: since nomadism until today's commerce, animal husbandry and industry. Narrated by the filmmaker's own voice, this short film provides a personal point of view about, not only the Yugur's idiosyncrasy, but also about part of the Chinese history, and takes by leading character one of the most grassland's representative animal: the sheep.
title: A History Of Sheep
